sentences.en: A charitable way to describe the process would be haphazard.
sentences.cn: 这一过程,按宽容的说法就是“随意”.

sentences.en: A specific job hunt will be more efficient than a haphazard one.
sentences.cn: 明确具体地寻找工作要比漫无目的地碰机会有效得多.

sentences.en: All the master had to do was shake the tree a little and the garden was full of leaves again, spread out in haphazard patterns.
sentences.cn: 大师什么都没有做，只是摇了摇树。 花园又重新被凋落的树叶覆盖了，整个花园展现出随意的样式。

sentences.en: Also, on the other people to change information ID and haphazard dogs.
sentences.cn: 还有, 上别人号而且乱改资料的狗.

sentences.en: Educational provision in the country is haphazard.
sentences.cn: 该国提供的教育毫无计划性。

sentences.en: Fishes of silver and gold paper had been pasted haphazard on ceiling and walls.
sentences.cn: 天花板、墙壁上杂乱无章地贴着银色和金色的鱼形花纸.
随便的回答往往是不对的.
他悔不该随口说出那些评论话.

sentences.en: His haphazard reading left him unacquainted with the authors of the books.
sentences.cn: 他信手翻阅各种书籍,因此对这些书的作者一无所知.

sentences.en: It is just a thing done at haphazard.
sentences.cn: 这只是件偶然为之的事情.

sentences.en: It was strings of words borrowed from the different languages around them and put together in sort of haphazard ways.
sentences.cn: 它只不过是从身边的不同语言当中,借用了一些单词串,以随意的方式将它们放在一起

sentences.en: Miss T'ang, didn't you get this haphazard, mixed - up feeling ? "
sentences.cn: 唐小姐, 你领略到这个 拉杂 错综的印象, 是不是? ”

sentences.en: One year after the deadline, the results are haphazard.
sentences.cn: 该法案规定的期限已经过了一年, 可各地的实际情况却参差不齐.

sentences.en: The books had been piled on the shelves in a haphazard fashion.
sentences.cn: 书架上的书堆放得杂乱无序。

sentences.en: The energy management of living systems is not a haphazard one.
sentences.cn: 生命系统的能量支配不是随意的.

sentences.en: The packing is usually fairly haphazard.
sentences.cn: 这种填充一般具有相当大的偶然性.

sentences.en: We are a haphazard bundle of inconsistent qualities.
sentences.cn: 人是不相一致的各种品质的大杂烩.

sentences.en: Why did you put the volumes of the encyclopedia in haphazard order?
sentences.cn: 你为何把这套百科全书放得杂乱无章?

trans.tran_cn: 偶然的，随意的，无计划的，任意的，胡乱的
trans.tran_en: happening or done in a way that is not planned or organized
